      • getErrors

        public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrors(java.util.List<java.lang.String> parentErrors,
                                                               ParentElement<? extends Element> parent)
        Returns all of the errors from the parent and all its child Elements. Intended for use by implementations of .
        Parameters:
        parentErrors - Errors from the parent itself, to be copied into the returned list
        parent - The parent element whose children will be scanned
        Returns:
        a combined list of all errors from the parent and all its children
